scripts.prod-publish: npm publish && cd publish && cd types && npm publish && cd ../chrome && npm publish && cd ../cloud && npm publish && cd ../compress && npm publish && cd ../image && npm publish && cd ../watch && npm publish && cd ../module && npm publish && cd ../node && npm publish && cd ../file-manager && npm publish
